thread.title: Spurned builders replacing Toby Keith bar-restaurant on North Shore
thread.title_full: Spurned builders replacing Toby Keith bar-restaurant on North Shore

title: Spurned builders replacing Toby Keith bar-restaurant on North Shore
text:
Spurned builders replacing Toby Keith bar-restaurant on North Shore Published 4:43 PM EDT Oct 13, 2015 Photos 
North Shore parking lots 
Developers in Pittsburgh are searching for a replacement after learning that a Toby Keith bar and grill is spurning their retail and office complex like one of the characters in a country song. 
The Pittsburgh Post-Gazette reports Columbus, Ohio-based Continental Real Estate Cos. was counting on Toby Keith's I Love This Bar and Grill to anchor the North Shore Place I and II complex on North Shore Drive. Much of the space of the restaurant had already been built out, including its trademark guitar-shaped bar. Continental's president of development in Pittsburgh, Barry Ford, says the developer has a "couple of good options on the table" for taking the space. The Post-Gazette reports the company that operates Keith's restaurant has had trouble keeping it afloat in other cities.
